title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embed and chat components.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; plug local models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chats.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Python; browse, pull, chat and manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) maintained by Ollama team; one-line run for any model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings and tool calls.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: Ready-made GitHub Actions for downloading, caching and serving Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Lightweight gRPC server shim exposing Ollama REST endpoints over Protocol Buffers for high-performance clients.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama; includes session memory and model selector widgets.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of RAG using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama; async HTTP, streams and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with DI-friendly interfaces and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async wrappers over Ollama REST endpoints; tokio & reqwest based.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Vicuna and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that leverages Ollama for local LLM chat, slash commands and thread isolation.
